post_text: How can artificial intelligence drive sustainability while upholding ethical principles? 🌍🤖The Markkula Center for Applied Ethics recently cohosted "AI and the Environment: Sustaining the Common Good" with Next10, bringing together thought leaders to discuss the transformative role of AI in environmental innovation.The recordings are available—don’t miss this opportunity to gain valuable insights into the ethical considerations shaping the future of AI and sustainability.👉 Watch here: https://bit.ly/4j3rHoi
